text:
Page Two
Burton, my life is such that I don't always know when and
where I'm living. Right now I have committed myself to the
following dates: March 17-18-19-21-22-23-25-26. Some might
cancel out, others might change. (Telephone call right here).
I'll dash off the other note to Foundations committee,
and that will be it for today.
Best regards.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Schooley
FES:nb
CC: Skornia
